column5:
I can’t work from home, at the same time if I travel out side for groceries it’s going to be an emotional roller coaster ride 

My anxiety switches to top gear !

Tomorrow I have to go to hospital for my SOs checkup ! I’m starting to feel anxious 

It’s going to be a bumpy ride I’m going to get all sorts of thoughts after the visit

I’m religious but this is madness ! 

No where it says that you slack and get help ! 

People of faith please understand this world is a test and it has its own rules

YES god will sometimes help you and it’s a subjective experience 

Rule no 1 Please do the reasonable thing protect your self masks..whatever effort that’s required 

Rule no 2 Now pray to god saying you’ve done your part and ask him to help 

Rule no 3 God doesn’t like slackers who sits and asks for things with out working for it 

A man said, “O Messenger of God, should I tie my camel and trust in god, or should I leave her untied and trust in god?” The Prophet, peace and blessings be upon him, said, “Tie her and trust in god.”

The issue is one of the symptoms of covid 19 is shortness of breath, I’m at home with my kid and wife 

I am going nuts over what if I am transmitting to then shit this is awful 

It’s a never ending cycle ! First I calm down saying everything okay 
Second get irritated and check symptoms and have a bloody bad time with anxiety and repeat 

It’s like this for past 4-5 days

Dang I thank and pray for the OP 
I feel a lot better bloody hell my body feels new kind of energy etc...

Ohhh thank god feeling the same here no cough no fever but I’m in high alert mode and it’s a pain ! When I don’t concentrate on my breath I am perfectly fine and when I don’t read news that’s also okay but I keep checking what’s the symptoms 

This post is a relief

If you are seeking scientific explanation for god I don’t think that would lead you to any good conclusion 

I had the same issue where science tells you something and scholars like zakir naik says Quran has science and the difficulty in reconciliation !

Then I saw videos about philosophy and philosophy of science/ biology 
Saboor, Hijab and Andalusian project 

Understood the core things about science and naturalism and understood science can never explain the existence of god (a supernatural / metaphysical entity ) 

Naturalism and Religion are two different paradigms

The issue is more complex than just saying “Why can’t they care” 

The Hadees says even though we are larger in number our nations are powerless ! 

They are dependent on super powers us China etc 

Even if the leader is ready help and accept the consequences the people aren’t ready !  Or they lack the mentality. We will blame the government and crumble the security we have now but when talking we talk like  king Fizal
Breath and stay strong ! and believe you can do it !

Indian supporters are overrated !!! It’s like you guys wanna win all the matches till end of the world ! Where’s the fun in that ? 

We are humans not robots you win some and loose some 

India is a great team you’ve got great talent ! You’ll bounce back
Ohhh mg because if the mad king innocent people are going to die !!!
May be going to remote island with no internet would help but then the anxiety of a virus flu or some disease give me the chills

We are at 4 or 5th step 
It is alleged that the current government created couple of racist groups 

The government sector is already racist but it’s not yet official
This is not the way !
That was my first thought but is it an NSX
This is the way

Discussing the possibility of weather he will be forgiven or not falls into two categories 

1. Infringement of the rights of an individual 
2. Rights of god 

For no 1 there’s no forgiveness until the person who has been wronged forgives 

No 2 it’s gods wish we have no idea about that

Have to say this upfront but I feel really bad for the protestors but still I’m sorry to say this I don’t see a better outcome for the protestors !!! 

My question is how do you fight a giant with 1000 eyes ??? You poke one he still have 999 left 

Will international pressure make China back down ? It seems no 

And at the same time most of the countries are afraid of china they don’t wanna risk their supply lines
Never going to happen

That’s not going to happen, I don’t this this message gets through to China ! With all the restrictions and the great firewall of China any news that’s against China will be dealt with in a swift manner leaving no room for any protests or uprising, 

At this point HK protestors need to step back and rethink their strategies

It’s very sad to see this but you have to make a deal with police and try to get out of the situation 

You are clashing with China freaking China !!! With all the resources 

It’s time to take a step back

Point 1 Please say good bye to freedom of speech 

Point 2 it’s going to be a kings rule, king GR

I have the same issue, When I am on edge with all negative and false thoughts  what helps me is breathing

Also dont wanna advertise but found this app called BetterHelp working through issues with a therapist helps a lot
